bilingual.source: Writing and acting out a short play.
Count the syllables as you are writing.
But writing is not his only hobby.
bilingual.target: 但写作不是他唯一的爱好。
看！这里有一个写作比赛。

bilingual.source: What sort of writing is the text?
bilingual.target: 这篇文章是什么类型的写作？

bilingual.source: After you have finished, check your writing.
Emma shook her head and stopped writing.
bilingual.target: 艾玛摇了摇头，停下了写作。

bilingual.source: Plan your writing using a chart like this.
bilingual.target: 使用这样的图表来规划你的写作。

bilingual.source: You've always been the best at writing in the school.
bilingual.target: 你一直是学校里写作最好的。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want you to overreact, but Tom kept writing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不希望你反应过度，但汤姆一直在继续写作。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Shawn. Miss Katy. How are you? How's the writing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 肖恩先生。凯蒂小姐。你还好吗？写作进行得怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: So Carrie, how's the writing going? Still working for Vogue? Freelance. Oh, that's fabulous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的写作怎么样了？还在《时尚》吗？自由职业，真棒。

yingyinNormal.en: And I did think about nothing but writing, until the next day, when I could think about nothing but food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了写作我别无杂念，到了第二天，满脑子都是吃的。

yingyinNormal.en: No. I have grant writing experience, and I'm used to dealing with Hollywood types, which I know are large contributors to your foundation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我有补助金的写作经验，而且经常和好莱坞的一些人打交道，我知道他们是你们基金的主要捐助者。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyways, I'm also writing a screenplay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，我正在写一个剧本。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Okay, so I'm writing you a check for...
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，给你的支票金额是…

yingyinNormal.en: So, did anything come of your writing Mr. Gross?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你写给格罗斯先生的信有什么结果吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, have you finished writing your profile yet? Almost.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，你的交友信息写完了吗? 快了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, sorry. No problem. What you writing there? A screenplay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思。没关系。你在写什么？剧本。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm so pathetic. Monica knows what she wants to say. You should've seen her. Writing, writing, writing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真悲哀，莫妮卡知道要讲什么，看她下笔如飞的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Well then, writing a hundred tickets a day should be easy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一天开100张停车罚单应该没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: I made a commitment in writing to comfort you in times like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我曾白纸黑字地同意过要在这样的情况下照顾你。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'm in. Staying up late, writing code, it sounds like a party.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我加入。一起熬夜，写代码，感觉像个派对啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Word. I should've just stuck to writing about what I know, being single.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一语中的。我应该只写自己熟悉的单身生活。

yingyinNormal.en: You put enough soldiers in the ground, you get tired of writing new ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 安葬的士兵太多，就懒得写新悼词了。

yingyinNormal.en: So that's Rachel, the girl you've been writing all those songs about? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她就是你那些歌的女主角瑞秋？对。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to help me. I'm supposed to be writing my vows and all I have is this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帮我忙，我需要写我的婚誓，可是我只有这些。

yingyinNormal.en: I will be writing to your families tonight, and you will both receive detention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天晚上我就写信通知你们的家人,还要罚你们两个劳动服务。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: So I'm almost done writing the song for Bernadette. Are you cool playing the cello?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给Bernadette写的歌就快完成了，你愿意(cool)用大提琴给我伴奏吗?

exam_freq_info.chinese: (the writing is on the wall)厄运将至

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执笔者；撰写人；撰稿人；作家；作曲家；著者；作曲者；抄写员；记录器
v. 重写；改写；修改
v. 写；书写；（write的过去分词）
n. 写作；写作技能；著作；字；字迹；书法；笔迹；著书；写作的职业；作品

word_family.mean: v. 写；书写；写…给；写作；编著；用文字形式表达；写入；承保；写字；函告

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: the writing is on the wall

examination_example.sentence: The quality of <highlight>writings</highlight> is of primary importance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 著作的质量是最重要的。

examination_example.sentence: In 1337, Petrarch began work on his rambling <highlight>writing</highlight> De Viris Illustribus — On Famous Men, highlighting the virtus of classical heroes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1337年，彼得拉克开始创作他漫无边际的作品《论名人》，突出古典英雄的美德。

examination_example.sentence: James Herriot did not find it easy in his early days of, as he put it,"having a go at the <highlight>writing</highlight> game".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如James Herriot所言，他早年在“写作游戏中的尝试” 并不容易。

examination_example.sentence: So I decided to look for some fashion-related courses that included <highlight>writing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我决定寻找一些时尚相关的课程，包括写作。

examination_example.sentence: Before applying for university I told everyone that I would study journalism, because <highlight>writing</highlight> was, and still is, one of my favorite activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在申请大学之前，我告诉所有人我会学习新闻专业，因为从过去到现在，写作始终都是我最喜欢的活动之一。

examination_example.sentence: From the earliest days of the Renaissance, the <highlight>writing</highlight> of history meant recounting the exemplary lives of great men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从文艺复兴初期开始，书写历史就意味着讲述伟人的模范生活。

sense_info_list.zh: (the writing is on the wall)厄运将至

examination_example.sentence: Does that mean the <highlight>writing</highlight> is on the wall for all European royals, with their magnificent uniforms and majestic lifestyles?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是否意味着所有衣着华丽、生活高贵的欧洲皇室成员将有大难了？

direction_info.description:

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执笔者；撰写人；撰稿人；作家；作曲家；著者；作曲者；抄写员；记录器
v. 重写；改写；修改
v. 写；书写；（write的过去分词）
n. 写作；写作技能；著作；字；字迹；书法；笔迹；著书；写作的职业；作品

word_family.mean: v. 写；书写；写…给；写作；编著；用文字形式表达；写入；承保；写字；函告

examination_example.sentence: They learned the techniques of collaborative <highlight>writing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们学会了合作写作的技巧。

examination_example.sentence: It proves to be far more effective than <highlight>writing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，这比写作有效得多。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to write a short essay on the importance of <highlight>writing</highlight> ability and how to develop it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于这一部分，你有30分钟的时间写一篇短文，阐述写作能力的重要性以及如何培养写作能力。

examination_example.sentence: Careme's <highlight>writings</highlight> dealt with fundamental cooking principles in a systematic way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡雷姆的著作系统地阐述了烹饪的基本原理。

examination_example.sentence: Suicidal thoughts have appeared in some students' <highlight>writings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些学生的作品中出现了自杀的想法。

examination_example.sentence: The New Jersey Education Department has flagged at least two pieces of <highlight>writing</highlight> on state English language assessments in which students expressed suicidal thoughts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新泽西州教育部已经在州英语语言评估中标出了至少两篇学生表达自杀想法的文章。

examination_example.sentence: Put all his complaints in <highlight>writing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把他所有的抱怨都写下来。

examination_example.sentence: What can we learn from the author's success in her <highlight>writing</highlight> career?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从作者写作生涯的成功中，我们能学到什么？

examination_example.sentence: Daily life provides ideas for creative <highlight>writing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 日常生活为创造性写作提供了思路。

examination_example.sentence: She had trouble in deciding on her <highlight>writing</highlight> style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她难以决定自己的写作风格。

examination_example.sentence: I once wrote a paper on the influence of fairy tales on Roald Dahl's <highlight>writing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我曾经写过一篇论文，谈神话故事对Roald Dahl作品的影响。

examination_example.sentence: They can not only be used in <highlight>writing</highlight> and painting but also for admiration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们不仅可以用于写作和绘画，还可以用于欣赏。

examination_example.sentence: Before people developed <highlight>writing</highlight>, storytelling was the most important way to pass along information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在人们发展写作之前，讲故事是传递信息最重要的方式。

examination_example.sentence: Today, Chinese <highlight>writing</highlight> system is still an important part of Chinese culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，汉字书写系统仍然是中国文化的重要组成部分。
